projects.name: librosa
projects.description: A Python library which includes common tools for low- and high-level signal-based music analysis.

projects.name: pretty_midi
projects.description: A Python library which makes it easy to create, manipulate, and extract information from MIDI files.

projects.name: MEAP
projects.description: The Music Engineering Art Projects (a collaboration with Columbia's Computer Music Center)

projects.name: Data-driven Music Understanding
projects.description: An NSF funded project into mining for structure in music audio

projects.name: The Listening Machine
projects.description: An NSF funded project into techniques for separating and recognizing sounds in mixtures

projects.name: Consumer video classification by soundtrack
projects.description: Using features from the soundtrack of environmental-type recordings for classification

projects.name: Separating Speech from Speech Noise
projects.description: An NSF funded project into signal separation aimed specifically at speech

projects.name: Music similarity
projects.description: Including a database of popular music along with a collection of subjective similarity measurements for the artists involved.

projects.name: Beat tracking and tempo estimation
projects.description: A simple dynamic programming approach to finding the regularly-spaced events in music audio.

projects.name: Cover Song Identification
projects.description: Trying to identify music audio that is based on the same melodic-harmonic content, despite changes in tempo, instrumentation, etc.

projects.name: Artist Identification by Timbral and Chroma Features
projects.description: An implementation of a baseline artist ID system, but also trying out chroma features to see if they help.

projects.name: Chord recognition
projects.description: Including our submission to the 2008 MIREX Chord Recognition evaluation.

projects.name: artist20
projects.description: A dataset of 20 artists (1413 tracks) plus a baseline artist identification system

projects.name: Music melody extraction
projects.description: Including example data for training and evaluating systems for extracting melody from ensemble music recordings

projects.name: Polyphonic piano transcription
projects.description: Including example data for training and evaluating piano transcription systems.

projects.name: Personal Audio Life Logs
projects.description: Our project investigating the use of continuous audio recordings of daily life.

projects.name: Speech recognition
projects.description: In noisy, overlapped conditions

projects.name: Music analysis
projects.description: To recover structure, and to navigate archives

projects.name: Marine Mammal Sounds
projects.description: Whales and dolphins in natural environments

projects.name: Pitch contour stylization
projects.description: Using drastically simplified pitch contours with almost no effect on perceived naturalness.

projects.name: MESSL
projects.description: A system for separating and localizing mulitple sound sources even in reverberation.

projects.name: snreval
projects.description: Implementations of a collection of signal distortion measures for characterizing corrupted speech.

projects.name: renoiser
projects.description: Tool to decompose a noisy speech file in to filtered speech component and noise, and to recombine at new SNR.

projects.name: skewview
projects.description: Tool to visualize timing skew between different audio files via short-time cross-correlation.

projects.name: chimefind
projects.description: Tool to locate "chime" sounds in long soundfiles.

projects.name: findNTs
projects.description: Tool to label "non transmission" (NT) regions in recorded radio signals.

projects.name: otanalyze
projects.description: A cut-down version of renoiser that can decompose "over the air" recordings into a filtered version of a clean signal and a noise residual.

projects.name: SAcC
projects.description: Noise-robust pitch detection based on trained classification of subband autocorrelation principal components.
